translations.payoutSettings.accountActiveDesc: Your account is ready to receive payments

translations.payoutSettings.pendingVerificationInfo: Please complete your Stripe onboarding to start receiving payouts. This usually takes a few minutes.

translations.payoutSettings.setupDescription: Connect your bank account to receive earnings from template sales. We use Stripe for secure payments.

translations.payoutSettings.title: Payout Settings
translations.payoutSettings.withdrawSuccess: Withdrawal initiated successfully! Funds will arrive in 2-3 business days.
